participant"}},"BidRevealed(address,uint256,string)":{"params":{"_address":"Address of the participant","_auctionKey":"Pass-phrase used by the participant","_bidAmount":"Bid amount committed by the  @param _owner an ethereum address that will be defined as the auction owner
@dev changes the stage from "start" to "commit". Only the auction owner can execute this

params._bidAmount: Bid amount committed by the participant

CloseAuction().details: closes the auction. Only the auction owner can execute this

CommitNewBid(bytes32).details: Accepts bids from participants in the form of a hash

RevealCommittedBid(uint256,string).details: Reveals bid amounts based on previously committed hash

params._auctionKey: the pass-phrase used to create the hash during commit
params._bidAmount: the amount used to create the hash during commit

StartCommitStage().details: changes the stage from "start" to "commit". Only the auction owner can execute this

StartRevealStage().details: changes the stage from "commit" to "reveal". Only the auction owner can execute this

constructor.details: creates a auction and defines its owner

params._owner: an ethereum address that will be defined as the auction owner

getLeader(uint256).details: allows the caller to access a particular element of the Leaders array

getLeadersNum().details: allows the caller to access the length of the Leaders array

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

BidCommitted(address,bytes32).notice: Emitted when a participant commits a hash

BidRevealed(address,uint256,string).notice: Emitted when a participant reveals their bid

LogStageChange(string).notice: Emitted when the owner changes the auction stage

CommitHashes(address).notice: a mapping of all the hashes committed by the participants during commit stage

CommitNewBid(bytes32).notice: the hash is created out of the bid amount and a passphrase that only the participant knows

RevealCommittedBid(uint256,string).notice: This can be called in the reveal stage

RevealedBids(address).notice: a mapping of all the bids revealed by the participants during reveal stage

currentLeaderBid().notice: Current Leading bid. Final winning bid upon auction close

currentLeaders(uint256).notice: Current Leader address(s). Array in case of a tie. Final winner(s) upon auction close
